website_summaries.verdict: The best budget wireless barcode scanner that connects easily to a computer.
pros: Included USB wireless receiver works up to 100 meters indoors
Plugs right into most computers with little required set up
cons: Reliability at longer distances is more spotty than when using the scanner close to the receiver

website_summaries.verdict: Easy to configure, with the convenience of a wireless connection, makes this a winner at its price point.
pros: Works reliably, picking up barcodes quickly
Integrates well with a number of different scanner apps, and pairs quickly with tablets
Simple to configure for database entries
cons: Instructions are sparse, leaving the user to figure out many of the scanner’s functions
Light or faded barcodes are not picked up right away by the scanner

customer_reviews.title: This scanner is very light and easy to use since you are not tethered by the ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well. I tried a different bar code scanner (cheaper) and had to send it back because it would not fit in the supplied cradle. This scanner is very light and easy to use since you are not tethered by the USB cable. I should have purchased this one to begin with. One tiny quibble; the USB dongle supplied is a little wide and will use up two ports if you are using a USB hub where the ports are close together. Other than that, a great little scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a barcode scanner for my salon to save time ringing people out for services and products. My software program wanted me to purchase theirs for $350. This does exactly what I needed for muchhhhh less.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyvictoriadahms

customer_reviews.title: REALLY NICE!! RECOMMENDED!!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY NICE!! RECOMMENDED!! The offline scanning its incredible to do inventory, it makes a 8 hours job into 2 hours. I took one star because it is not very accurate with not-so-dark barcodes. you must move a lot the scanner to get those read. but if the barcode is dark it will read it instantly. This is a must have item for stock control and stores. Its plug and play, the offline barcode needs to be activated by scanning some barcodes in a plastic card provided. I bought 2 and planning to buy 8 more in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan L.B.P.

customer_reviews.title: but it's actually pretty sturdy and the battery lasts quite a while
customer_reviews.text: Feels light and cheap, but it's actually pretty sturdy and the battery lasts quite a while. It worked on my Chromebook even though I use it primarily on my Windows machine. Not a fan of the huge USB dongle, and the beep is annoyingly loud but fortunately you can scan a programming code into it to lower the volume or eliminate the beep altogether. I highly recommend using the programmable features to suit your needs. Ergonomically speaking, I prefer using this at home to my $250 Bluetooth Opticon.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Bruford

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little tool. I've had the older model symbol scanner for years and finally decided to try this one out. I should have done it a long time ago. The other geeks give me the stink-eye when we're doing a 1,200 unit roll out and they're double-verifying serial numbers manually. I just run down the row... beep beep beep beep beep and I'm done in about 1 minute. lol. Driver Compatibility: I'm sure your mileage will vary, but it's installed on two Windows 10 Pro machines for me with absolutely no driver downloads needed. It's just been plug and play and I'm up and running in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Jordan

customer_reviews.title: ... have gone this long without this product - I LOVE IT! Just ordered a 3rd one
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I have gone this long without this product - I LOVE IT! Just ordered a 3rd one.
customer_reviews.author: Kara F.

customer_reviews.title: I like, works
customer_reviews.text: works well, yes, it is true that the beep is not really a beep, but it works correctly, it reads the vast majority of the codes, even those that I thought would not work like the one in the photo. I place my iphone on the reader, and using my laptop as a bridge now I have a price and inventory verifier for only $39 dlls and does not ask anything testers of $ 400 or more
customer_reviews.author: fire side

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Range, great for libraries!
customer_reviews.text: I am a librarian and work in a building that is four floors. We purchased this to do inventory on our collection. It was simple to hook up- just connect the USB to our computer, scan the mode we want on the included card, and then go out to the collection and scan our items. I connected the scanner and was able to scan items that were floors away from my computer. I cannot estimate the distance but it was pretty far. For this reason I think it would be a good option for a warehouse or other large building. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Performance is really bad
customer_reviews.text: If scans several bar codes in row with more than 6-digit number, there is always 2~3 seconds delay/buffer occurring. This product is useless in the business unless you scan a bar code at least several seconds apart. I don't understand how this product has a 4-star review. I have been working in POS industry more than 15 years, and this product is the worst scanner in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: This product works swimmingly. Out of the box, I pull the trigger. I immediately hear a beep and when I look through the laser window (not pressing the trigger, of course) the laser mirror is silently vibrating, ready to scan. It comes with a card containing commonly used system codes, like shutdown, and options for instant upload or storage mode. Only things to improve on: - Codes to adjust beep volume are in the middle of the manual, and it would be easier if they were on the plastic card. - It would be nice if it came with a stand. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The setup was fairly easy, but since we were using two kinds of ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this barcode scanner because our old one stopped working. The setup was fairly easy, but since we were using two kinds of barcodes we had a slightly complicated setup. The customer support (via email) was very helpful and got things sorted for us very quickly! The barcode scanner works perfect! Great value for the product
customer_reviews.author: ramin89

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner for School Libraries!
customer_reviews.text: I am the media coordinator at an elementary school and was looking for an affordable wireless scanner that would work with my Library Management system, Follett Destiny. I received the scanner in a timely manner and found that at first it did not work with my system. The help support was great and after sending them a picture of my barcodes and explaining what was happening, they sent me great directions and now the scanner is working great. It is a very economically scanner for libraries. Thank you to tech support who worked with me so quickly to get the scanner going. I will be recommending their product to all of my library friends.
customer_reviews.author: Elementary Media Coordinator

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with all programs....
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned this for about a year now and battery barely died. Recharge and I was good to go again, or so I thought. For some reason this stopped working with my program Delicious Library 3. It used to work flawlessly, but not it wont even get recognized by the program. The scanner still works in a text file, etc, but is now incompatible with Delicious Software. Don't know if it was a os update or program update that broke this, but the reason I only give it 4 stars is because the manual on trying different things is horrible and it must be missing something to lose Compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: PsychoKiller

customer_reviews.title: Continually had to reboot computer to keep it working
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This was very affordable but did not work with my computer consitently. I had to reboot my computer to get it to work. I ended up upgrading to a Zebra scanner that works much better for my application. I appreciate the customer service offering to replace the scanner after I initially left my review and even offered a $15 refund if I were to remove this review. I stand by the 2 stars and will keep the review as is because I believe others should be aware that this is not a great scanner for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this reader to catalog my comic collection. I find myself swiping the barcode time and time again before I finally get a reading, some times I get no reading at all. I've been forced to input everything manually. This thing is beyond fustrating
customer_reviews.author: Guy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I want to catalog my home library by scanning the ISBN codes. I use linux. I was very worried about getting the barcodes into my software. This scanner simply puts the barcodes into whatever application has focus. A spreadsheet, a bash command line, or into a python program waiting for input with the input statement. And, it supplies a carriage return after each scan. This worked right out of the box. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Problems reading many barcodes
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other barcode scanners, this one has problems reading a lot of barcodes. Perhaps it's the fact that the laser light is blue compared to red? Probably has an issue with 20-25% of barcodes, based on our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Turcotte

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have used usb barcode scanners for a long time and have a few of them. I needed to get another one and decided to try out this wireless one. How have I lived without this in my life I do not know.... best purchase this year, so happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Jaredd

customer_reviews.title: A great gun at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a mediocre experience with this bar code gun. The company generously sent a replacement. Wow, what a difference. This gun responds very quickly. It is just as quick as my old wired bar code scanner. Range is good. This is an excellent product. The reading speed of this gun is disappointing. The connectivity is good. It takes this gun too long to read the bar code. I use it to read 1500 - 2000 in approx. 2 hours. Using this gun was frustrating. Point ant wait...and wait. Hoped it would be better..
customer_reviews.author: Teeville

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: I just received and set-up this scanner. This has been the easiest process to set up a wireless scanner. Its straight forward, and pretty self-explanatory. I love how the card has different bar codes to switch modes of storage to clearing storage. For the price I paid, this has been a breeze to set up. I also received a card qualifying me for an extra 6 months of warranty coverage..That is surely appreciated. My company received a lot of inventory and this is going to make my life so much easier. Definitely worth the price. Deepika
customer_reviews.author: Dee Vee

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Work Out of Box
customer_reviews.text: Received this product but the scanner doesn't work. All appears fine - scanner is charged, USB light is blue but when the scanner is used on a barcode, nothing happens despite the red line appearing. I've tried scanning barcodes in the pamphlet sent and on books - nothing works. I have emailed the company for support and will update my review if they respond. Otherwise, I will have to return this scanner and go a different route. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Madden

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, if only for 2d barcodes
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, this is a 2d barcode scanner. It will NOT scan qr codes. I wish I would have known that, had to order a different model. That being said, the scanner did a great job of picking up the 128 encoder barcodes our printer made even at odd angles or through syran wrap. It did not do well through glass, I suspect that's an issue with the glass refracting the laser in odd ways Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: sdninja

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective solution
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few of these scanners for inventory control purposes. The scanners are working great, are very simple to use, and I have been able to do some simple programming that bring extra value. I would like them to have a timestamp function, but you really can not complain given the price point. In addition, I have been in touch with their tech support to help with some set-up questions and they were extremely helpful and stuck with me until all of my questions were resolved. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a cost effective scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Bob John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this scanner. Once you figure out how to use it (the instructions are very minimal), it works like a charm. I love the storage mode and how light and easy it is to carry around. It's very easy to charge and use and works with a lot of my computer programs. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Cash

customer_reviews.title: Worked straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to have to do a 10000 book inventory and am looking forward to having a spare scanner. (5 star review) Update: October 2020--Barcode scanner stopped scanning. Upon contact, the company immediately sent out a replacement scanner, however the USB dongle chimes like something is loose inside. The scanner does work though. Will update again if it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: dyjung

customer_reviews.title: Good price for an o.k. reader
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for an inexpensive bar code reader. You can't program it with additional data but I tried it for an idea at work and was happy enough with it. I have issues with scanning through cellophane wrapping every now and then, particularly if the wrapping is raised from the barcode, anything on a silver colored background such as aluminum, chrome, zinc plated. It also won't read large printed barcodes
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was bit skeptical about this but man I was so wrong. Received today March 6th. Open the box plugged in USB into POS and its good to go. Works perfect. Has cable too if it runs low on battery n if you want to charge at night time. Also it has auto hibernation mode which is big plus considering this scanner is wireless. Also it comes with little booklet (which has barcodse n other info which I haven't read yet) and small credit card size card with few barcodes on there like battery %, storage, shutdown. Definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Dhaval Patel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice to do home / home office inventory
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice! Low cost, works as advertised, easy to use, cordless. Couldn't ask for better!
customer_reviews.author: Magic48

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 12 of these and a month after use they are starting to drop like flies. Not worth it if you are using them everyday. Very fragile. Also a tip: if you have hard to read barcodes get a scanner that has a thick laser line. It will read it 10x better. this one comes with a thinner line and struggles more.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse Vazquez Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance For The Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this scanner to try in our warehouse and have been very pleased by its performance. The scanner works great for everything we have tried. We can scan our bar code labels from more than 100 feet away from our computer. The scanner does a surprisingly good job scanning damaged bar codes. All of this performance is surprising for a unit so economically priced. We are planning to by several more of these units.
customer_reviews.author: archichuk

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you get a dud
customer_reviews.text: The first unit I got was a dud, it would not charge past 60%. Amazon quickly sent me a replacment and it works great and charges to 100% now. The receiver unit could be smaller but happy with ease of use. One thing to note is having the unit plugged in will only charge the scanner it will not allow you to transmit any data through the cable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with the USB receiver
customer_reviews.text: Basically, it was unusable. I could charge it, scan things... but with no USB receiver, it was useless. Nadamoo was zero helpfull. They basically said I could ship it back at my expense, plus a $39 restock fee, or sell it on Ebay. Amazon customer service stepped in and sent me a free new USB receiver, so I hope that works.
customer_reviews.author: Squatty

customer_reviews.title: Great value, reliable device, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed to complete a large inventory scan for my retail business and warehouse but did not want to spend $1000's on expensive scanners or an inventory servicve. Scanners worked great for us, all in bought 10 of them. Battery life is great, scanners easy to use. Imported scans easily into a .txt file and the into my pos system. Now we use them for all kinds of counting, sorting, receiving inventory, etc. Great price as well. I would recommend to anyone looking for the same/similar solution.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun H

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Device
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really impressed with how easy this is to use. It only took a few minutes to connect and set up, I was scanning in no time at all. All the settings are done simply by scanning a bar code in the manual. The unit is small enough to sit on my desk and easy to use. I've only been using it for a couple weeks and with the auto-shutoff enabled I haven't had to charge the battery yet.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product, worse tech support
customer_reviews.text: The receiver for the scanner stopped working after less than 2 weeks of use. It could not be recognized by the USB port in any of my computers. Contacted tech support. After great delay they sent me a link to buy a new receiver. They didn't attempt to resolve the issue or send me a working receiver for a system that had less than 10 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: I really didn't think that e-mailing customer service was going to result in anything but I was very pleasantly surprised and happy with their response
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nadamoo model YHD-5100. It works perfectly, We needed it to read in capital letters and i couldn't figure out how to make it do that so I e-mailed customer service, and they responded within about 12 hours and gave me the information i needed to change it to read capital letters. I really didn't think that e-mailing customer service was going to result in anything but I was very pleasantly surprised and happy with their response. Thank you for great customer service. Kim - Washington State.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Youngren and Kim Youngren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scanner for an Apple!  Worked perfectly the first time.
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a barcode scanner that would work on an Apple. I received this device, plugged it in and it worked like a charm the first time! I use this for scanning CEUs for EMS classes in Virginia. Very happy. Finally found a scanner that works on the Apple with the Virginia Office of EMS CEU Program! This worked on the first try. No issues. Quick and easy. YEAHHHHHHH!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KGM

customer_reviews.title: When its connected it works pretty well and has decent range
customer_reviews.text: Frequently disconnects from it's own bluetooth sensor and you need to disconnect/reconnect it to the computer then it will work for another ten minutes or so before needing to repeat. When its connected it works pretty well and has decent range, otherwise its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is master piece. I have verifone ruby system at my gas station and I wanted to have usb scanner for my back up Office so I can add new products from my office. It came with all details and also contact info for additional help. I am not much into tech side so I was confused and I emailed to their tech support and they replied me right away how to configure it and I applied those steps and it is working like a champ now. I recommend this to other business owners too.
customer_reviews.author: Manthan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It worked right out of the box exactly how I expected. I plugged in the hand held device and charged it. I then connected to the wireless USB on my laptop. I then launched word and scanned various bar codes and the device read and printed the text on a line in my word document. Works just like I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The scanner lasted me less than 2 weeks, when it started making a loud clicking noise from inside the scanner and then when I went to go use it again, it wouldn’t scan anything because the laser faded away and won’t turn on. Tech support was very difficult to talk to as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had some trouble with one of the applications I was trying to use this scanner with and I contacted Nadamoo customer service and they gave me a barcode scanning procedure to try and that resolved the issue. They were very helpful and the scanner works great and is easy to use. I have used the scanner to scan into applications on mac and PC.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Tech support is in China and will only email you. Takes forever to get help and the scanner quit working after 1 month. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: benton

customer_reviews.title: Spend more money and get something better
customer_reviews.text: Only sometimes works. It might scan the barcode one time but will not scan it the next. Turned out to be a headache and was manually having to enter barcodes. Updated stars to a 3 because of the customer service. They did their best to assist me and made right with a refund offer. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: crystal king

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product works for a little bit then shuts off. Not worth the money. The quality is not good
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Scanner OK, directions cryptic
customer_reviews.text: Scanner works fine - if directions are pretty cryptic though. the directions detail out how to set all the settings.. but if you are like me and don't know what the settings do then you will want to go with something with a little more help. If you are just looking for a scanner to send data just like a keyboard does, then this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Setup in 2 mins (plug and play) and really fast response time and scans all barcodes in my warehouse. Can’t really speak on the battery life between charges since I’ve only had it for a few days. Great product for a great price !
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect. So much functionality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I remember buying $500 bar code scanners that did not work as well as this one. So many settings you can adjust to get it to input exactly the way you need it, and the settings are easy to change by just scanning commands from the user manual.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner and Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is lightweight and easy to use. I am a Library Media Specialist and was looking for a wireless scanner to use in the library. At first, I had some issues with older bar codes, but I contacted customer service and they helped me very quickly. Their response time was less than 24 hours and they even followed up to make sure everything was working properly. I highly recommend the NADAMOO Wireless Barcode Scanner!
customer_reviews.author: Kelleen Todd

customer_reviews.title: Bought in November dead less than 6 months later.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! Did not even last 6 months. Changing my initial 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Gal

customer_reviews.title: Knowing what it will read and what not to read ?
customer_reviews.text: Like so many products today the hype is all the things it can do.....but never enough details that indicate what it can't do. I this case the this bar code readers could not read that same company's preprinted asset bar code labels. There should be a listing of all commercial bar codes this device will read and those acceptable preprinted bar code labels or formats it works with or not. There are a myriad bar codes lets get specific as to what it can and cannot do.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Skaling

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner, easy set up but.....
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but a couple of complaints, Beep when scanning isn’t very load or clear wish it was more definitive “beep”. Has a hard time scanning slightly faded stickers, or bent stickers. Pros are it was very easy to set up, good distance when scanning wirelessly. Very good overall just some small features that need fixing for a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Maui J.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the scanner this school year for self-check out in our school library. Its hit the ground many times and still works. We are pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Cheap. Works!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is completely plug-n-play. Plug in the USB transmitter. Open a spreadsheet. Start scanning. The scanner has really long range - tried it out over about 200 feet and it worked great. The only issue I've had is that this type of scanner uses a mechanism that won't let it scan a barcode from a computer screen (at least not for me). But, scanning printed barcodes is fast and painless.
customer_reviews.author: SpiFive

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SHIPPING JEFF GREAT AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Cuts down on warehouse mistakes and makes shipping faster. Great barcode scanner at a GREAT price. On my 2nd, only because Shipping Jeff let the 1st unit drop in the trash can...... If only this barcode scanner could prevent that warehouse error.
customer_reviews.author: StevieT

customer_reviews.title: Seller sent me a new one and it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Seller sent me a new one and it works fine. Its battery doesn't get charged and now it is useless. When it is plugged to be charged, blue light comes on. But it doesn't power on after being charged for hours and hours.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is great, I usually have some problems scanning certain equipment but this one surely didn’t have that problem so I’m very pleased.....
customer_reviews.author: Braulio Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: It works decently.
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got barely worked at all. The company was gracious enough to contact us about the product and offered to send one free of charge. The replacement scanner works a lot better. But it still has issues, the distance and offset angle from the barcode have to be pretty close. It still has difficulty picking up barcodes even 6 away. It doesn't compare to our old Motorola LS4278s, but those were four times as expensive. In the end, you get what you pay for. As far as cheap 1D barcode scanners go, this is a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portability yes, a bit flakey though
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem with this is it has trouble with many of my barcodes. I'll read them great one minute, then not handle 1 or 2, then an hour later it has no trouble with the same ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gilgamesh

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This company was great to work with. They answered all questions quickly and even checked in with us while we were in the decision making process to see if we had any additional questions/concerns. The instructions for use were clear and simple. It did not take long to get the units set up and working for our applications. We are very pleased with the range of the receiver, as we are using the scanners in multiple rooms at our facilities. They perform exactly as intended and advertised. We highly recommend this product and company. Thank you for the great customer service and support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for online sellers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this barcode scanner to help make selling items online more efficient and it was a total game changer! Amazing battery life and great range have made setting up shipments faster and easier.
customer_reviews.author: R3COOL

customer_reviews.title: Good Price - Longevity Unsure
customer_reviews.text: For a decently priced scanner, it is not bad. We have had one USB port go bad and one scanner stop working but then after leaving unplugged for a few days - they both began working again. Honestly - for the price point - it's hard to beat them as long as they stand the test of time and heavy usage in our spring season. Time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: JSnuff

customer_reviews.title: Love this scanner so much! Bought one and then many more for my stores!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wireless scanner for the money and is super easy to use! The manual is easy to understand and it comes with a plastic card with the most important barcodes on it to keep with you when using it (clearing, store, upload, instant, etc). The range is pretty decent too; can cover an average size strip mall retail store easily. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Parcell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a scanner that can be programed to turn all letters in a barcode to ALL CAPS. This scanner states that it does perform this function, downloaded the full owners manual from their website but after scanning the correct barcode it still does not scan as ALL CAPS. Unfortunately, that is a mandatory function for my needs so it doesn't work for me. Also, it is not very sensitive. In this case, you do seem to get what you pay for. It did pair easily, and has a good working range. For low level needs it might be ok, but if you need anything specialized then pass.
customer_reviews.author: Angell025

customer_reviews.title: Great for Point of Sale systems
customer_reviews.text: We have a retail store with a Point of Sale Cash Register. Our Data base uses the UPC-A bar codes that exclude the leading and check digit. The unit was charged out the box. I plugged in the receiver, scanned the hide UPC-A leading digit bar code, scanned the hide UPC-A check digit bar code and scanned the carriage return bar code. It took less than 5 minutes and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: Man I should have bought this sooner! Was looking at it for a couple a months debating if I should buy it or if it will actually work but man. It’s way better then walking around with a cable!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Trejo

customer_reviews.title: The best scanner I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner after my old one broke. (I broke it by stepping on it) And I had my old one for over two years and I have no doubt this will last me longer! The range is incredible the storage on the thumb drive is very useful and the scanner is very well-made!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the scanner and it works perfectly as described. Great battery life and plenty of settings to customize your bar code scanner exactly as you needs it. In addition to a great product they back it with wonderful customer service. I had a quick question and I emailed the support team. Got an e-mail within hours with the solution (it was a simple setting). They even e-mailed me back the following day to make sure my concern was addressed. Can't beat this product for functionality or support!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Jones

customer_reviews.title: The best for your e-commerce business or any business inventory/shipping items!!!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in the hand, great scanning system 100% recommend. Wireless as well & includes charging cord. I use this for my e-commerce business inventory for storage and shipping items and works great with inventory lab! This is all you need, has everything all in one.
customer_reviews.author: MMendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Just used for a couple days. Plugged in the USB and boom it was ready to scan! Value for the money is A+. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Sam Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use for the Technology Challenged
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this buy. So easy to set up. The barcode scanner reads very well. We gave this to one of our 60 year old workers (who claimed she was technology challenged) to check ones in and out at work. She learned how to use it in 5 minutes and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Davila

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep track of my several hundred bottle wine collection. Zero setup required. Plug in the USB adapter, start scanning. Have not had a problem scanning any barcodes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, reads even the smallest of bar codes, even through poly bags. Fast USB sync and excellent range. I was able to use it for inventory with excel with minimal setup. Turn on and go. Durable feel.
customer_reviews.author: Hiral Patel

customer_reviews.title: everything works as claimed - except usps barcode
customer_reviews.text: It is cost effective. Only problem is that it somehow would not recognize usps code, and yes the usps code scan is explicitly confirmed in the manual, as well as several q&a, reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great support, decent scanner.
customer_reviews.text: The scanner works well enough. Its not designed to handle much abuse, and ours failed after a few months of use. Fortunately Nadamoo support was great and sent us a replacement free of charge. Considering the price point and solid support I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Good Coverage
customer_reviews.text: We use the scanner through our entire office and don't have any issues. Quickly scans and is a reliable tool for our office.
customer_reviews.author: City-Souvenirs

customer_reviews.title: Slow and bad resolution
customer_reviews.text: This product has bad quality, we brought 2 of these units and both units had really bad resolution and last years to detect a code... we throw the equipements away.
customer_reviews.author: Brippe

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: Used this to inventory my Christmas lights. It worked really well and pasted right into Excel for both Windows and Mac. It emulates a USB keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Met all expectations out of the box. Lightweight, easy setup, and IT WORKS. Only setting I changed was the time before auto shut off since the default 2 minutes was too fast for us.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, it charged properly and scanned the barcodes properly. It has easy to follow instructions included and is well built. A+
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fuller

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Use it in our library at school and gives great range and easy to use. We were able to just plug it into our computer and start using right away!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan and Shannon Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: Barcode works great for what i use it for . Had to reach out to customer service to have a replacement sent as the usb transmitter stopped working. They were very helpful on sending one out to me right away.
customer_reviews.author: D3ADRONIN

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought another
customer_reviews.text: This scanner has performed well in a rough environment and has been flawless. Liked it so much that I purchased a second to replace a corded scanner that could benefit from the mobility offered by wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible  DO NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: This barcode scanner works 30% of the time and 70% doesn't want to scan anything, it's just so annoying. I do not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Rayan

customer_reviews.title: Great barcode scanners.
customer_reviews.text: These scanners are easy to use abd setup and the batteries last all day. They are also light weight, which is nice and hen using them for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Easy pairing with MS Surface and Android phone. Comes with a USB cord for charging and probably for times when host does not have Bluetooth. You will need to supply a USB converter in order to charge the device from wall or other none USB enabled source of power (no charging converter included).
customer_reviews.author: eddykay

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after one scan.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times I read the instructions scanning was very difficult and then it would quit. Yes, it was charged. Unfortunately, I waited too long and couldn't return it. Waste of Money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Faye Ann

customer_reviews.title: Break Easily
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money. They tend to break easily, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Baggett

customer_reviews.title: Installation a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner, easy to use. Really works at distance stated. Nice price. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a few scanners and this one is by far the best. Plug in the USB receiver and it's ready to work. It scanned for about 3 months before I had to recharge it. Very happy with the quality of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Miakko

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, instructions are lacking
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. The instructions have obviously been transcribed from another language, and some things have been “Lost in translation.” It does the basic things easily, but trying to program it for advanced functions is difficult to figure out, due to poor instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Matt &.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to use scanner
customer_reviews.text: Took a few minutes to know how it would put the info into Excel, but after that I was off to the races. Great time saver!
customer_reviews.author: Karl PanKratz

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to setup on my MacBook but isn’t programmed to work on my chromebook which is what I really needed it for. Anyone know of one that works with a chromebook I’d love to know!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Reich

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scanner quite a bit since I purchased it. I can say I am impressed with the quality of this scanner for the price! Very pleased & highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Scully

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner if your bar codes are standard size
customer_reviews.text: We're a quilt shop, and we have bar codes (Code 128) on the end of our spools of thread. This scanner won't read them. Other than having problems with the smaller codes, it's a great scanner for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R

customer_reviews.title: Distance and accuracy is perfect
customer_reviews.text: For price it does the job. Scanning the barcodes on thermal paper is little slow but works like it says. Tested little over 200 feet with no problem also from inside the Cooller scans fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Patel

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked at the start with the USB wireless as keyboard input. I printed out a few barcode tags and it read them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner and it worked great, for awhile. When it stopped working, I contacted customer service. Sent them a video of the issue and they replaced the scanner. I have purchased several of these and they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reyes II

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The USB cable is only for charging, which is kind of misleading. Accessing the scanner and data through the USB Virtual COM mode is involved, but the company responds quickly if you need help. Overall, a decent product that seems durable and has good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Buser

customer_reviews.title: Easy, works well and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, works well and gets the job done. It's smaller than the picture makes it seem but still big enough. One complaint is when scanning 24 characters it has about a 3-4 second lag from showing up on your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Espinoza

product_meta.title: NADAMOO Wireless Barcode Scanner 328 Feet Transmission Distance USB Cordless 1D Laser Automatic Barcode Reader Handhold Bar Code Scanner with USB Receiver for Store, Supermarket, Warehouse
feature_bullets: Long Distance Wireless Transmission Technology.Delivers up to 400m transmission in open air/100m transmission indoor. No More Data Cable Needed, easily connected with your laptop, PC etc.
With Mini USB Receiver,USB plug-and-play, no drive installation needed.Just plug USB and open up a EXCEL/WORD file then scan,works like a virtual keyboard input

Two paring mode: One-to-one mode,More-to-one mode. At one-to-one mode,one scanner only transmit barcode to the one usb receiver. AT More-to-one mode,Multiple scanners can transmit barcode to the one usb receiver - ideal in a warehouse where several people are scanning at once.

Two working mode:Instant upload mode / storage mode. Internal offline storage supports up to 100,000 barcodes in offline storage mode. Scan and store barcode when far away from the receiver,and then update the data to your device when you come back entering the wireless transmission range.
Two scanning mode:Key the trigger to begin scanning or switch to automatic mode for quick scanning without pressing any buttons

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,058 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
